name: Auto-generate documentation from spec updates
description: Regenerates API documentation when specification documents are updated

action.message:
The specification document {{filePath}} has been updated. Please review the changes and update the following documentation if needed:

1. API documentation in docs/API.md
2. Configuration documentation in docs/CONFIGURATION.md
3. Examples in docs/EXAMPLES.md
4. Main README.md

Ensure all new requirements, interfaces, and configuration options are properly documented with examples.
